title: BARKitecture, How To NOT Coronavirus 3.4.20
itunes:title: BARKitecture, How To NOT Coronavirus 3.4.20
description:
In episode 582, Jack and Miles are joined by MEGA podcast's Holly Laurent to discuss Quibi's upcoming slate, Super Tuesday and how Joe Biden is doing in polls, Chris Matthew's leaving Hardball, the spread of coronavirus, Taco Bell's 'veggie mode,' Ben Affleck's movie ideas, movies releasing in March, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Short-form streaming app Quibi now available for pre-order
  2. Joe Biden takes aim at front-runner Bernie Sanders on Super Tuesday
  3. Chris Matthews Out at MSNBC
  4. Top US doctor says coronavirus now an ‘outbreak,’ possibly a ‘pandemic’
  5. Did a Noted Pathologist Write This Viral Coronavirus Advice Letter?
  6. The WHO sent 25 international experts to China and here are their main findings after 9 days
  7. Taco Bell's New 'Veggie Mode' Automatically Makes Everything on the Menu Vegetarian
  8. Ben Affleck Still Wants To Make A ‘McMillion$’ Movie Starring Matt Damon
  9. Every Movie Releasing In March 2020
  10. WATCH: Cosurmyne - Jungle

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
